overview: Black Beauty is being trained to run in the steeplechase race, upon which the Cameron family has staked its fortune. However, the horse is injured racing for a doctor when its owner is hurt, and it looks like it won't recover in time to compete in the race.
tagline: "ALL MEN KILL THE THING THEY LOVE" - It Tugs At The Heratstrings Of Humanity!
title: Black Beauty
